Transmission.description:
Open Source BitTorrent client.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/dperson/transmission, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

51413.description: Port used to share the file being downloaded. You may need to open it (protocol: tcp and udp) on your firewall. Suggested default: 51413.
51413.label: Sharing port

/var/lib/transmission-daemon.description: Choose a Share where Transmission will save all of it's config and data files including your downloads. Eg: create a Share called transmission-data.
/var/lib/transmission-daemon.label: Data Storage

GROUPID.description: Choose a GID to run transmission as.
GROUPID.label: GID

TRPASSWD.description: Choose a login password for the Transmission WebUI.
TRPASSWD.label: WebUI password

TRUSER.description: Choose a login username for Transmission WebUI.
TRUSER.label: WebUI username

USERID.description: Choose a UID to run transmission as.
USERID.label: UID
